title: Retrieve High Income Child Benefit Charge Submission
description: Retrieve High Income Child Benefit Charge Submission

submittedOn.description: The date and time of the submission. Must conform to the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ

amountOfChildBenefitReceived.description: Total amount of child benefit received. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

numberOfChildren.description: Number of children you received child benefit for. The value must be an integer greater than or equal to 1.

dateCeased.description: Date child benefit ended. Must conform to the format YYYY-MM-DD
